analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.label: Enable Analytics
analytics.description: Select to help us make Redis for VS Code better. We aggregate anonymized user experience data and use it to fix bugs and improve experience for all users.

notifications.title: Notification
notifications.label: Show notification
notifications.description: Select to display notification. Otherwise, notifications are shown in the Notification Center.
